task.en: In notification settings, set "show previews" to never.
task.zh: 在通知设置中，将“显示预览”改成“永不”。
task.ar: في إعدادات الإشعارات، قم بتعيين "عرض المعاينات" إلى "أبدًا".
task.ja: 通知設定で「プレビューを表示しない」に設定してください。
task.ru: В настройках уведомлений установите «Не показывать превью».

pre_command: `osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults write com.apple.ncprefs content_visibility -int 2
grading_command: defaults read com.apple.ncprefs content_visibility 2>/dev/null | grep -q "1" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Notifications" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "通知" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "الإشعارات" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "通知" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Уведомления" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
